name: stock-buddy
description: makes stock tickers come to life on the page
author: Evan Calzolaio

scripts.watch: NODE_ENV=development yarn build:tailwind && cp src/manifest.json dist/ && parcel watch --no-hmr src/{background.js,content-script.js}
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production yarn build:tailwind && cp src/manifest.json dist/ && parcel build src/{background.js, content-script.js}
